Key Match Events: India dismissed Ireland for just 96 runs and chased the target down in 12.2 overs
Arshdeep Singh dismissed both Irish openers in the third over
Hardik Pandya got a wicket in the seventh over
Jasprit Bumrah struck in the ninth over
Pandya added two more wickets to his tally
Axar Patel got a wicket through a brilliant catch in his only over of spin
Rishabh Pant finished off the chase in style
Jasprit Bumrah was named player of the match
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma won the toss and chose to field first
India's team combination, particularly in the batting order, was a major interest
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the T20 World Cup 2024
